## RouteLocationOptions interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouteLocationOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [force?](./reactivuety.routelocationoptions.force.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Triggers the navigation even if the location is the same as the current one |
|  [replace?](./reactivuety.routelocationoptions.replace.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Replace the entry in the history instead of pushing a new entry |
|  [state?](./reactivuety.routelocationoptions.state.md) | [HistoryState](./reactivuety.historystate.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> State to save using the History API. This cannot contain any reactive values and some primitives like Symbols are forbidden. More info at https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/History/state |
